content.query:
ALTER DATABASE CURRENT COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AS_SC_UTF8;



SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://bank-raw-data@kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/customers.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
WITH (
        customer_id VARCHAR(10),  
        age INT,
        gender CHAR(1),                   
        income DECIMAL(10,2),
        employment_status VARCHAR(20),
        years_employed INT,
        city VARCHAR(50),
        state VARCHAR(50)
    ) AS result;
